heroSection.subtitle: Big Balls is the platform for you and your friends to create a group to bet on games of a league and show that you know more!
heroSection.formPlaceholder: Search for a league or a user

sectionKnowMore.title: Hey, Tough Guy!
sectionKnowMore.subtitle: It's simple! It's fun! And it's free!
sectionKnowMore.text: Big Balls is your new bet to challenge your friends, that are tough like you.

sectionCreateLeague.title: We are tough, but also easy!
sectionCreateLeague.subtitle: Create your own league to bet with your friends or subscribe to an existing one.
sectionCreateLeague.text: It's simple and easy. Choose which tournament you want to follow, invite your friends and make fun of each other.
